root.name: Fatal Fury: Wild Ambition
root.description: Overview Fatal Fury: Wild Ambition is a 3D fighting game developed and published by SNK for the arcade (under the Hyper Neo Geo 64 board) and the PlayStation. Â Characters Terry Bogard Andy Bogard Joe Higashi Mai Shiranui Kim Kaphwan Billy Kane Raiden Ryuji Yamazaki Li Xiangfei (must be unlocked in the Arcade version)Touji SakataTsugumi Sendo Geese Howard Duck King (PlayStation only, beat the game with all characters) Ryo Sakazaki (as Mr. Karate, PlayStation only, beat the game without continuing)

similar_games.game: Tatsunoko vs. Capcom: Ultimate All Stars
